steps.criteriaActionHelpText: Can only Submit a Draft Return Order

steps.name: Cancel Return Order

steps.criteriaActionHelpText: Cannot cancel a Return Order when it is Closed or Canceled

wizardList.name: Return Order Management
wizardList.description: Steps to manage the lifecycle of a Return Order

steps.name: Create Service Contract
steps.helpText: Create a Service Contract from this Location, utilizing a Contract Plan. Service Contracts created from the Location will have the Location’s Assets added as Contract Lines on the Service Contract, per the Plan criteria.

steps.name: Create Maintenance Plan
steps.helpText: Create a Maintenance Plan utilizing a Maintenance Plan Template. Maintenance Plans created from the Location will have the Location’s Assets added as Maintenance Assets on the Maintenance Plan, per the Template’s Applicable Product criteria.

steps.name: Create Condition-Based Maintenance Plan
steps.helpText: Create a Condition Maintenance Plan utilizing a Maintenance Plan Template. Maintenance Plans created from the Location will have the Location’s Assets added as Maintenance Assets on the Maintenance Plan, per the Template’s Applicable Product criteria.

steps.name: Review Work Order
steps.helpText: Add labor, travel, products consumed & expenses to a work order.
steps.criteriaActionHelpText: This wizard step is only enabled when Work Order status = Completed.

steps.name: Create Opportunity
steps.helpText: Create an opportunity from one identified on the work order.
steps.criteriaActionHelpText: This wizard step is only enabled when Work Order status = Completed and Opportunity Id = true

steps.name: Close Work Order
steps.helpText: Close the work order, its work order lines and open milestones
steps.criteriaActionHelpText: This wizard step is only enabled when Work Order status = Completed.

lookupConfigList.description: Filter to show only Active Maintenance Plan Processes

expressionList.name: A360 - Return Order - Approved Or Submitted
A360 - Return Order - Not Closed Nor Canceled
expressionList.description: Return Order status is not "Closed" nor "Canceled"

expressionList.name: A360 - Return Order - Not Open
expressionList.description: Return Order status is not in an *open* (New, In Progress, ...) status.

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - Complete Or Closed
A360 - Work Order - Depot
expressionList.description: Work Order record type is "Depot" and status is not "Closed"

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - Field
expressionList.description: Work Order record type is "Field" and status is not "Closed"

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - Has Opportunity
expressionList.description: Work Order has an identified opportunity and status is not "Closed"

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - New
expressionList.criteria: Status = 'New' AND SVMXA360__IsEntitlementPerformed__c = true AND ( AssetWarrantyId != null OR ( ServiceContractId != null AND EntitlementId != null ))
expressionList.description: Work Order status is "New" and entitlement has been performed

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - Remote
expressionList.description: Work Order record type is "Remote" and status is not "Closed"

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - Has Asset
expressionList.description: Work Order has an Asset and status is "In Progress"

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - Supplier And In Progress

expressionDetailList.referenceFieldLabel: Return Order Line Item ID > Processing Plan

expressionList.description: Work Order status is "In Progress" and ROLI processing plan is "Supplier Warranty"

expressionList.name: A360 - Asset - Not Obsolete
expressionList.description: Asset Status is not equal to “Obsolete”

expressionList.name: A360 - Service Contract - Not Expired
expressionList.description: Service Contract Status is not equal to “Expired”

expressionList.name: A360 - Service Contract - Incomplete Authoring
expressionList.description: Service Contract Authoring Status is equal to “Incomplete”

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order Line - Labor, Travel
expressionList.criteria: ( SVMXA360__LineType__c = 'Labor' OR SVMXA360__LineType__c = 'Travel' ) AND ( Status = 'New' OR Status = 'In Progress' )

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - Estimate, Not Approved
expressionList.description: Work Order record type is "Estimate" and Status is not "Approved"

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - Current Step
expressionList.description: Work Order status is "In Progress" and Start - End is "End Current Step"
expressionList.criteria: Status = 'In Progress' AND SVMXA360__WorkStepStatus__c = 'End Current Step'

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - Next Step
expressionList.description: Work Order status is "In Progress" and Start - End is "Start Next Step"
expressionList.criteria: Status = 'In Progress' AND SVMXA360__WorkStepStatus__c = 'Start Next Step'

expressionList.name: A360 - Work Order - New Or In Progress
expressionList.description: Work Order status is "New" and entitlement has been performed, or Work Order status is "In Progress"
expressionList.criteria: ( Status = 'New' AND SVMXA360__IsEntitlementPerformed__c = true AND ( AssetWarrantyId != null OR ( ServiceContractId != null AND EntitlementId != null ))) OR Status = 'In Progress'

expressionList.name: A360 - Open Asset Notifications
expressionList.description: Open notifications with critical and moderate severity.

entitlementRuleList.name: Work Order Entitlement - A360
entitlementRuleList.description: Default entitlement rule for Work Order
